scripts.deployment-general: npx uglifyjs dist/constants.js dist/GeckoFormManipulator.js dist/GeckoFormListener.js dist/GeckoFormMessage.js dist/GeckoFormGenerator.js dist/GeckoForm.js -o dist/bundles/gecko-form-generator.js
scripts.deployment-haefeli: npx uglifyjs dist/constants.js dist/GeckoFormManipulator.js dist/GeckoFormListener.js dist/GeckoFormMessage.js dist/GeckoFormGenerator.js dist/GeckoForm.js dist/customerForms/haefeli/haefeli-data.js dist/customerForms/haefeli/executioner.js -o dist/bundles/gecko-form-generator-haefeli.js
scripts.deployment-multitransport: npx uglifyjs dist/constants.js dist/GeckoFormManipulator.js dist/GeckoFormListener.js dist/GeckoFormMessage.js dist/GeckoFormGenerator.js dist/GeckoForm.js dist/customerForms/multitransport/multitransport-data.js dist/customerForms/multitransport/executioner.js -o dist/bundles/gecko-form-generator-multitransport.js
scripts.deployment-multitransport-quick: npx uglifyjs dist/constants.js dist/GeckoFormManipulator.js dist/GeckoFormListener.js dist/GeckoFormMessage.js dist/GeckoFormGenerator.js dist/GeckoForm.js dist/customerForms/multitransport-quick-1/multitransport-data.js dist/customerForms/multitransport-quick-1/executioner.js dist/customerForms/multitransport-quick-2/multitransport-data.js dist/customerForms/multitransport-quick-2/executioner.js -o dist/bundles/gecko-form-generator-multitransport-quick.js
scripts.deployment-northcoast: npx uglifyjs dist/constants.js dist/GeckoFormManipulator.js dist/GeckoFormListener.js dist/GeckoFormMessage.js dist/GeckoFormGenerator.js dist/GeckoForm.js dist/customerForms/northcoast/northcoast-data.js dist/customerForms/northcoast/executioner.js -o dist/bundles/gecko-form-generator-northcoast.js
scripts.build: npm run generate-dist && npm run deploy-src && npm run deployment-general && npm run deployment-haefeli && npm run deployment-multitransport && npm run deployment-multitransport-quick && npm run deployment-northcoast
